ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Anderson searches for Hammy Blish on the demon world.
An explorer is killed outside his spaceship on a jungle planet.
A robot Judge Dredd thinks he is the real Judge Dredd.
Micky Swift rescued by Cockburn who offers him lunch.
